item.title: My first Script!(Auto-Walker from lumby to gobby house)
item.dc:creator: @SMasher SMasher
item.description:
@SMasher wrote:

[code]{SMasher’s AutoWalker to Gobby house, from Lumbrigde!}
{This is my first Script, it doesnt have any Anti-Ban}
{If you use this script, please give me Credit thanks}

program LumbytoVarrok;
var
x, y, DTM, Goblin: Integer;

Procedure loadDTM;
begin
Goblin:= DTMFromString(‘78DA635CC4C4C0A0CC800254FC2DC0342394C’ +
‘F486F356AF8D50000C4230748’);
DTM := DTMFromString(‘78DA63EC676260E066400115E59A609A11CA6’ +
‘79C48580D008A38036F’);
end;

Procedure Bridge;
begin
if(findDTM(DTM, x, y, 522, 4, 754, 169))then
clickmouse(x, y, true);
writeln(‘On our way to the Goblins!’);
end;

Procedure GoblinHouse;
begin
if(findDTM(Goblin, x, y, 522, 4, 754, 169))then
movemousesmooth(x, y);
wait(1000);
clickmouse(x, y, true);
writeln(‘We are here, happy training!!’);
end;

begin
loadDTM;
Bridge;
wait(12000);
GoblinHouse;
end.[/code]

Thanks to Goldec for the DTM tutorials!

Read full topic
item.source: My first Script!(Auto-Walker from lumby to gobby house)
